net.milkbowl.vault.chat

Class Chat

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.milkbowl.vault.chat.Chat

  • public abstract class Chat
extends Object
    The main Chat API - allows for Prefix/Suffix nodes along with generic Info nodes if the linked Chat system supports them
